remarks: A subspace orthocomplement belongs to the ` DVecH ` vector space. (Contributed by NM, 22-Jul-2014.)
statement:
dochssv.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dochssv.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochssv.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
dochssv.o $e |- ._|_ = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochssv $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ X C_ V ) -> ( ._|_ ` X ) C_ V ) $.
